text:
Isle Cafe at Cuppage Plaza is a rare find in the Orchard Road area, this Cafe serves very nice food at affordable prices for breakfast and lunch.

Although the cafe occupies 3 shop spaces and has quite a big seating area, it is advisable to be there early to avoid the breakfast and lunch time crowds.

This is a great place to enjoy Japanese food and shop in the busy Orchard Road area. Our plaza is known for its many Japanese restaurants, which serve tasty sushi, ramen, and other dishes made by skilled chefs. In addition to food, you can find different shops offering beauty services, travel help, and special items.

Old school shopping mall with lots of authentic Japanese eateries, especially Yizakaya, here. However, after COVID, this place has became very sleazy. You can see streetwalkers around the building after 9pm.

Old mall with many slimy feeling businesses, but a really good spot for Japanese food. A lot of good dining options around the entire mall, from the cheapest of kopitiam food, through to bento sets and expensive omakase stuff.
